alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 9:25PM MST until December 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches tonight into Sunday morning above 6500 feet. Southwest winds gusting up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 11 PM tonight to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions on US Highway 89A. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 AM Sunday: Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
